actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide coverage of prescription digital therapeutics for the treatment of mental health and substance use disorders under the Medicare and Medicaid programs, and for other purposes.
short_title: Prescription Digital Therapeutics to Support Recovery Act

summary.text:
Prescription Digital Therapeutics to Support Recovery Act

This bill provides for Medicare and Medicaid coverage of prescription digital therapeutics that use behavioral treatments to prevent, manage, or treat mental health or substance-use disorders.

titles.title: Prescription Digital Therapeutics to Support Recovery Act
Prescription Digital Therapeutics to Support Recovery Act

A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide coverage of prescription digital therapeutics for the treatment of mental health and substance use disorders under the Medicare and Medicaid programs, and for other purposes.
